value:
$WmMPID_総選挙エーデル,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_ELECTION01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_ELECTION01,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_ELECTION01,Face|So. How about this weather?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Is it me, or has it gotten really tense
here all of a sudden?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_ELECTION01,Face|Really? I hadn't noticed. What could
possibly have these two so worked
up, I wonder?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_ELECTION01,Face|You can drop the act, Claude.
This isn't Fódlan.$k$pAre we really going to insist on
dragging Fódlan's conflict into Askr?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エーデル,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_ELECTION01,Face|No. Lysithea has a point. There is no
good reason for us to fight one
another in this world.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_ELECTION01,Face|I suppose the change does render
our old grudges rather irrelevant.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_ELECTION01,Face|Spoken just like the Dimitri I... Nope,
can't get through it with a straight
face. When did you learn to relax?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エーデル,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_ELECTION01,Face|I must admit, I share his surprise.
You are a completely different person
than the Dimitri I faced in battle.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_ELECTION01,Face|I shudder to think what became
of me in your worlds.$k$pIn my Fódlan, the Kingdom of
Faerghus defeated the Adrestian
Empire, and I was crowned king.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_ELECTION01,Face|Yeah, that's...not what happened
in mine.$k$pAnd I'll bet the Empire was victorious
in your Fódlan, wasn't it, Princess?
Or should I say Your Majesty?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エーデル,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_ELECTION01,Face|Yes, it was. But victory did not come
by my strength alone. My teacher
was always at my side.$k$pThe war in your world must have
gone well for the Leicester Alliance,
Claude. Did you become king?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_ELECTION01,Face|The Alliance did win the war, and we
did establish a new unified kingdom
of Fódlan.$k$pClaude didn't rule it, though. He went
back home to Almyra and lived as
royalty there.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_ELECTION01,Face|Claude is Almyran royalty?$k$pHow can that be? Were you not
the heir to House Riegan?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_ELECTION01,Face|We can talk out little details like that
another time. For now, I have a favor
to ask of the both of you.$k$pFirst, why don't we stop giving
Princess Sharena a headache and
call a truce for our stay in Askr?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Yes, please! I'm all for that. We can't
have the Heroes fighting each other.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_ELECTION01,Face|I understand that our purpose here is
to defend the people of Askr.
With that in mind...I accept.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エーデル,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_ELECTION01,Face|As do I. To be at one another's
throats now would be counter
to all our goals.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_ELECTION01,Face|Great to hear. There's just one more
tiny little wrinkle.$k$pThere are other versions of us here.
Versions who are five years younger.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エーデル,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_ELECTION01,Face|You're joking.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_ELECTION01,Face|Afraid I'm not. So let's all keep clear
of them, OK? It's for the best we not
talk to them about...well, anything.$k$p
